SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.service.implementation

Class OrderHistoryServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.peaslimited.shoppeas.service.implementation.OrderHistoryServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderHistoryService
@Service public class OrderHistoryServiceImpl extends Object implements OrderHistoryService
This class is an implementation of the OrderHistoryService interface and provides methods for retrieving and managing order history for consumer. It interacts with the OrderHistoryRepository to perform database operations related to order history data.

  • Method Details

    • getOrderHistory

      public List<OrderHistoryDTO> getOrderHistory(String uid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a consumer's entire order history (past orders)for a given user ID (UID) using the OrderHistoryRepository.
      Specified by:
      getOrderHistory in interface OrderHistoryService
      Parameters:
      uid - The user ID for the user whose order history is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A list of OrderHistoryDTO objects representing the user's past orders.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task that retrieves the order history.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted while waiting for a result.

    • addOrderHistory

      public void addOrderHistory(String uid, ArrayList<Object> cartList) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, IOException, URISyntaxException
      Adds a new order to the order history of a given consumer using the OrderHistoryRepository
      Specified by:
      addOrderHistory in interface OrderHistoryService
      Parameters:
      uid - The user ID whose order history will be updated with the new order.
      cartList - A list of objects representing the items in the user's cart that will be added to the order history.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task that adds the order history.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted while waiting for a result.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while adding the order history.
      URISyntaxException - If there is a syntax error in the URI when interacting with external resources.
